description:
When Mona Wales unwraps her new doll, she discovers he's no different than all her others: fucking stupid, boring, and useless. He's bigger than other Ken dolls, though. Warmer. Still no personality, but--- he has a cock that supposedly works. Why not use it!
Mona mounts his limbs to stilts and takes Ken for a ride as the personal pony she's always wanted. Watch him buck and canter as she crops his cock and punches her frustration out on his mindless body. Bored, she decides to fuck his ungrateful asshole for her pleasure then saddles up on his face instead.
A long day of riding makes Mona's pussy so wet, she just may use her anatomically-correct doll's parts to get herself off...if he's lucky...
title: Sadistic Barbie Breaks Ken Doll
